# List of presidents of the I Chamber of the Landtag of Saxony

The President of the I Chamber of the Landtag of Saxony was the presiding officer of the upper chamber of that legislature.
{| class="wikitable"

! Period
|-

|1849
|-
|Robert Georgi
|1849–1850
|-
|Friedrich Ernst von Schönfels
|1850–1862
|-
|Friedrich von Frisen
|1863–1870
|-
|Ludwig Freiherr von Zehmen
|1871–1890
|-
|Richard von Könneritz
|1891–1906
|-
|Friedrich Vitzthum von Eckstädt
|1907–1918
|}
